A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The last Jedi\, a film with so much promise but falls so far with the sad clump of Snokes corpse and underused character development. A film bristling with sub plots that are inconsequential and differ to the arc set out by Force Awakens\, that ultimately offer no logical character development. A film that blasts away the mystery and awe left by its predecessor\, and shows its loyal\, theory conniving audience that nothing is going to be linked to what they thought.
A film\, that pays homage to one of my all time idols\, with what I can only describe as the most ludicrous and unfortunately hilarious of endings.

All I can say is\, JJ\, I would like to think this was not your intended storyline from the beginning. I would like to think that Rian blindsided your concepts and simply betrayed your vision of the new characters.
I hope\, you are the spark\, that brings about episode nines triumphant return.
